statements: SELECT * FROM SmartRefrigeratorUsagePatterns;
SELECT user_id, temperature_setting FROM SmartRefrigeratorUsagePatterns WHERE usage_hours > 5;
SELECT * FROM SmartRefrigeratorUsagePatterns WHERE temperature_setting BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT user_id, humidity_setting FROM SmartRefrigeratorUsagePatterns WHERE humidity_setting < 60;
SELECT user_id, usage_hours FROM SmartRefrigeratorUsagePatterns ORDER BY usage_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM SmartRefrigeratorUsagePatterns WHERE temperature_setting > 5 ORDER BY usage_hours DESC;
SELECT user_id, temperature_setting, humidity_setting FROM SmartRefrigeratorUsagePatterns WHERE usage_hours < 10;
SELECT user_id, temperature_setting, usage_hours, humidity_setting FROM SmartRefrigeratorUsagePatterns WHERE temperature_setting BETWEEN 2 AND 8 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(usage_hours) AS avg_usage_hours, SUM(usage_hours) AS total_usage_hours FROM SmartRefrigeratorUsagePatterns WHERE humidity_setting >= 60;
SELECT MAX(temperature_setting) AS max_temperature, MIN(humidity_setting) AS min_humidity FROM SmartRefrigeratorUsagePatterns WHERE temperature_setting < 10;
SELECT * FROM refrigerator_usage;
SELECT user_id, temperature FROM refrigerator_usage WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT energy_usage, time_stamp FROM refrigerator_usage ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommended_temperature, recommended_energy_saving FROM recommended_settings;
SELECT user_id, recommended_temperature, recommended_humidity FROM recommended_settings WHERE recommended_energy_saving = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM recommended_settings WHERE recommended_temperature > 20 ORDER BY recommended_humidity DESC
SELECT user_id, temperature, time_stamp FROM refrigerator_usage WHERE temperature < 5 ORDER BY time_stamp
SELECT user_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_used FROM refrigerator_usage GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_energy_used > 50
SELECT user_id, recommended_temperature, recommended_humidity FROM recommended_settings WHERE recommended_energy_saving = TRUE
SELECT user_id, temperature, humidity FROM refrigerator_usage WHERE humidity > 60 AND temperature BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY time_stamp DESC
SELECT user_id, temperature_setting, humidity_setting, energy_saving_mode FROM user_settings;
SELECT user_id, temperature, humidity, energy_consumption, usage_timestamp FROM usage_data;
SELECT user_id, recommended_temperature, recommended_humidity FROM recommendation;
SELECT user_id, humidity_setting, temperature_setting, energy_saving_mode FROM user_settings;
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, recommended_temperature, recommended_humidity FROM recommendation;
SELECT user_id, temperature_setting, humidity_setting FROM user_settings WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, temperature, humidity, energy_consumption FROM usage_data WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY usage_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommended_temperature, recommended_humidity FROM recommendation WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, temperature, humidity, energy_consumption FROM usage_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommended_temperature, recommended_humidity FROM recommendation WHERE recommended_temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT user_id, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM refrigerator_usage WHERE temperature > 5;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_profile WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT fridge_id, model, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM fridge_inventory WHERE purchase_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT user_id, temperature_setting, humidity_setting FROM recommendation_settings WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM refrigerator_usage ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM refrigerator_usage WHERE temperature > 5 AND humidity < 80;
SELECT user_id, name, address FROM user_profile WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT fridge_id, model, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM fridge_inventory WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung' OR manufacturer = 'LG' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, temperature_setting, humidity_setting FROM recommendation_settings WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_profile JOIN refrigerator_usage USING (user_id) GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) >= 2;
SELECT * FROM refrigerator_usage ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, temperature, humidity FROM refrigerator_usage WHERE temperature > 5 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT username, email, age FROM user_profile WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM notification_logs WHERE message LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, current_temperature, current_humidity, power_saving_mode FROM refrigerator_settings WHERE power_saving_mode = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profile WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommended_temperature FROM recommended_settings WHERE recommended_temperature > 10 AND recommended_humidity < 60;
SELECT user_id, message, timestamp FROM notification_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, current_temperature AS temperature, current_humidity AS humidity FROM refrigerator_settings WHERE power_saving_mode = TRUE;
